title: Ep: 055 - Artist and Designer Lindsay Stone
description:
In this episode of Architecture, Design & Photography we sit down with Artist and Designer Lindsay Stone. We speak with Lindsay about her series Ashes to Ashes, her journey as a working artist, and her move towards designing and selling lingerie.

Lindsay Joy Stockbridge Stone is an artist and designer living in Cumberland, Maine. Her home and studio are in the country where she is raising eight chickens, two cats, and one baby with her husband Forrest, who is also a maker.
 

More from Lindsay Stone:

Website: http://www.lindsayjoystone.com

Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/jessica-mann-amato-a7106a7/

More from us:

Website: http://www.trentbell.com

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/lindsayjoystone/
author: info@trentbell.com (Trent Bell)
